title: A LangSmith Alternative that Takes LLM Observability to the Next Level
title1: A LangSmith Alternative that Takes LLM Observability to the Next Level
title2: A LangSmith Alternative that Takes LLM Observability to the Next Level
description: Helicone and LangSmith are two powerful LLM observability platforms. Let's dive into Helicone's advantages as a proxy, flexible pricing, and seamless integration with numerous LLM providers.
author: Lina Lam
